Hi,

Using Heritrix 1.12

I'm trying archive text files with the extension =
*.ms, but not all
servers report the content-type as text/plain. Some repor=
t the type as
application/x-troff-ms, and some report it as text/plain, and=
 I had
one server report it as application/ms.

I could accept the files pu=
rely by file extension, but not all URLs
reference a file name. So I want t=
o include a range of content types.

How can I perform an "OR" logical oper=
ation for the writer rule. If
the file extension is *.ms OR it's content-ty=
pe is one of
(text/plan,application/x-troff-ms,application/ms).

My thought=
s are to start writer rules with a RejectDecideRule, then a
MatchesFilePatt=
ernDecideRule (with custom rule), and then a
ContentTypeMatchesRegExpDecide=
Rule.

But I couldn't get it to work.
